Projects

Here are some projects I have worked on for school, work, or fun. Watch this space!

Seeing Sound

Seeing Sound is an AR/VR project that addresses loss of stereo hearing by developing a set of visual indicators that assist users to localize sounds in their environment.

Demo
Gestural Music Interface

An instrument that allows musicians to augment vocal performances in real time. Uses gestural input from a Leap Motion controller to trigger chord progressions and vocoder parameters via MAX/MSP.

Demo
Face Morphing

I produced various morphs and calculated average faces for a population.

Website
Roadmap

Roadmap is a productivity webapp that aims to improve personal goal setting and visualize productivity. Uses Flask, Jquery and SQLite.
